desc: Stone + Beige is an Irish home interiors online store with a range of hand picked pieces. Each item has been selected to brighten, soften and compliment each room in your home. We also provide interior consultancy services, get in touch with us for more information.

layout.text: Style this beautiful piece of tableware as a set on your dining table for a dinner party that offers a wonderfully eclectic mix of old and new. A true statement piece in and of itself, why not prop this decorative plate up against a wall when not in use as a charming ornamental piece that showcases show-stopping style.
